sentence: Sherwin-Williams Company ( SHW ) will begin trading ex-dividend on May 13, 2015.
A cash dividend payment of $0.67 per share is scheduled to be paid on May 29, 2015.
Shareholders who purchased SHW prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 21.82% increase over the same period a year ago.
At the current stock price of $286.95, the dividend yield is .93%.
The previous trading day's last sale of SHW was $286.95, representing a -1.9% decrease from the 52 week high of $292.51 and a 46.52% increase over the 52 week low of $195.85.
SHW is a part of the Consumer Services sector, which includes companies such as Home Depot, Inc. ( HD ) and Lowe's Companies, Inc. ( LOW ).
SHW's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $9.04.
Zacks Investment Research reports SHW's forecasted earnings growth in 2015 as 27.31%, compared to an industry average of 12.8%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the SHW Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
